competenciasEspecificas: OBJ1. Understand and interpret the main ideas and the basic plot lines of texts expressed in the standard language, searching for reliable sources and making use of inference strategies and verification of meanings to respond to the exposed communicative needs.

OBJ2. Produce original texts, of increasing length, clear, well organized and detailed, using strategies such as planning, synthesis, compensation or self-repair, to express ideas and arguments in a creative, appropriate and coherent way, in accordance with specific communicative purposes.

OBJ3. Actively interact with other people, with sufficient fluency, precision and spontaneity, using cooperative strategies and using analog and digital resources to respond to communicative purposes in exchanges that respect courtesy standards.

OBJ4. Mediate between different languages or varieties, or between modalities and registers of the same language, using effective strategies and knowledge aimed at explaining concepts and opinions or simplifying messages to transmit information efficiently, clearly and responsibly, and creating an atmosphere positive that facilitates communication.

OBJ5. Expand and use personal linguistic repertoires between different languages and varieties, critically reflecting on how they work, making explicit and sharing their own strategies and knowledge to improve the response to their communicative needs.

OBJ6. Critically assess and adapt to linguistic, cultural and artistic diversity based on the foreign language, reflecting on and sharing the similarities and differences between languages and cultures in order to act empathically, respectfully and effectively, and foster mutual understanding in intercultural situations.
